title: Sentimental
lyrics:
Nal gajgo noldeun maldeun sang-gwan an hae sasil
Mwoladeun neolamyeon nan geunyang joh-ass-eo Hey
Honjaseo ttangchigo byeogchigo nanli beobseog tteol-eossji yesnal-en
Geulaedo nae yeop-i neolaseo joh-ass-eo Uh uh
Gamanhi nun-eul gam-abomyeon nega

Gamanhi gamanhi nae yeop-e iss-eul geos gat-eunde

Sseulsseulhi nae mam-i chug cheojimyeon nega

Nae eokkael todagtodag geolil geos gat-eunde



Sentimental hae na Sentimental hae

Neo eobsneun nae bang-eun teong bieoseo Sentimental hae

Myeoch senti an-e nega nuwo issdeon ge

Manyang eojgeuje gat-eunde

Sentimental hae neo eobsneun nae bang an-eun



Bab-i neom-eoganeun geol bomyeon geulaedo mom chaeng-gineun geol bomyeon

Gwaenhi ileoneunga sipdagado tto usneun neol bomyeon heundeullyeo

Gibun tas-igessji mwo neodo da ijgo jinael tende mwo

Byeolgeogess-eo naega gieog-ina nagess-eo



Gamanhi nun-eul gam-abomyeon nega

Gamanhi gamanhi nae yeop-e iss-eul geos gat-eunde

Sseulsseulhi nae mam-i chug cheojimyeon nega

Nae eokkael todagtodag geolil geos gat-eunde



Sentimental hae na Sentimental hae

Neo eobsneun nae bang-eun teong bieoseo Sentimental hae

Myeoch senti an-e nega nuwo issdeon ge

Manyang eojgeuje gat-eunde

Sentimental hae neo eobsneun nae bang an-eun



Nado byeonhan geon ttaghi eobs-eo

Neodo yeojeonhagessji eodi gagess-eo

Dol-agago sip-eun geon nega geuliwojin geon (aninde)



Sentimental hae na Sentimental hae

Neo eobsneun nae bang-eun teong bieoseo Sentimental hae

Myeoch senti an-e nega nuwo issdeon ge

Manyang eojgeuje gat-eunde

Sentimental hae neo eobsneun nae bang an-eun
